original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.36. Sanidassanattika, Saraṇaduka
analyzed: sani dassana ttika sa raṇa duka

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na araṇam ca na anidassana sappaṭigham na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: (Sahajātavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi paṭiccavāra sadisam

original: 22.36.1. Hetu-ārammaṇādi
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ satta

original: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ satta

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca dhammā sa nidassana sappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ satta

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ a nidassana appaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa

original: araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca
analyzed: araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇo ca

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca dhammā anidassana appaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte nissaye
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekavīsa anantare tīṇi pe sahajāte nissaye

original: ekavīsa, upanissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte ekavīsa
analyzed: ekavīsa upanissaye tīṇi pacchājāte kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte ekavīsa

original: …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: pe avigate ekavīsa

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba
